text: Allah [1], yini tomaderake srsti karechena, tarapara tomaderake riyâ€Œka diyechena, tarapara tini tomadera mrtyu ghatabena abasese tini tomaderake jibita karabena. (Allahâ€Œra sathe sarika sabyastakrta) tomadera ma'budagulora emana ke'u ache ki, ye esabera kono kichu karate pare [2]? Tara yaderake sarika kare, tini (allah) se saba (sarika) theke mahimamaya-pabitra o ati urdhe
